mapper.insert: insert into TemplateDetail ( TemplateGroupId, ControlId, OrderNum, Name, Title, DefaultValue, ControlData) values ( #{templateGroupId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{controlId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{orderNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{title,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{defaultValue,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{controlData,jdbcType=NVARCHAR})

update.foreach: insert into TemplateDetail (templateId,ControlId, OrderNum,Name, Title, DefaultValue, ControlData) values (#{item.templateId,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{item.controlId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.orderNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.name,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{item.title,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{item.defaultValue,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{item.controlData,jdbcType=NVARCHAR});

mapper.select: SELECT TC.ControlType , Title , Name , DefaultValue , td.ControlData, CASE WHEN oc.ControlValue IS NOT NULL THEN oc.ControlValue ELSE '' END AS HadValue, CASE WHEN oc.ControlValue IS NOT NULL THEN oc.ControlValue ELSE '' END AS ControlValue, OrderNum FROM dbo.TemplateDetailSnapshot AS td ( NOLOCK ) LEFT JOIN dbo.TemplateControl AS tc ( NOLOCK ) ON td.ControlId = tc.id LEFT JOIN dbo.OrderChild AS oc(NOLOCK) ON oc.TemplateSnapshotId=td.SnapshotTemplateId AND oc.OrderId=#{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND oc.ControlName=td.Name WHERE td.SnapshotTemplateId = #{templateId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND ISNULL(oc.IsEnable,1)=1 ORDER BY OrderNum ASC
SELECT * FROM dbo.TemplateDetail AS td ( NOLOCK ) WHERE td.TemplateId = #{templateId,jdbcType=INTEGER} order by OrderNum
